message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $750000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $750000 is still a bit high for my budget.  I'm willing to offer $650000 for the product.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value we both see in this deal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to lower the price to $700000, but I believe it's still a fair price considering the value the product brings. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower than this.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. $700000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to offer $675000. This is a good compromise, as it's closer to your last offer and closer to my budget.  I believe we're close to a deal, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement in the next round.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm now offering the product for $675000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than this. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I'm hoping we can finally come to an agreement.
